title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\SmartReplyAnswer
name: SmartReplyAnswer
description:
Represents a smart reply answer.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SmartReplyAnswer

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.confidence
params.description: Smart reply confidence. The system's confidence score that this reply is a good match for this conversation, as a value from 0.0 (completely uncertain) to 1.0 (completely certain).

params.name: data.answer_record
params.description: The name of answer record, in the format of "projects//locations//answerRecords/"
